name: THE YELLOW SIGN
description:
a modern, second-person take on the classic horror story by robert w. chambers. originally made for the narrative design class at new york university. 

7k+ words. mostly linear, with a few choices to explore the world. beginning poem is taken directly from the short story itself.

now you may be wondering "why the motif of teeth. this literally isn't mentioned once in the original story" i just think they're neat.

all images are public domain.
